name: Cultist Astronaut!
description:
Cultist Astronaut is a 2D Platformer, bullet hell; focusing on a lone goat cultist, hellbent on converting and/or purging the galaxy of heretics and their competing cults! This is currently in Alpha but we are refining our current level into a solid shoot-em-up game.

Music by Teknoaxe: www.teknoaxe.com/Home.php
